metadata.name: THE WAY OF WATER
metadata.description:
THE WAY OF WATER
The shot I wanted here is to convey the scarcity and importance of water in our life as we may take it for granted. 
In the frame, you can see a girl from a tribal village named Bayyakkapeta, located in Telangana, India gathering water from a pit and collecting them in the vessel. This is the daily activity of the girl and women in their village who walk kilometres to gather drinking water. 

I captured this image on 16th September 2022 at 7:30 am IST on my Sony Alpha 7R iii, with a 35mm lens. 

Artist: Arun Kumar Nalimela
Achievements: NFTYDREAMS Photo Contest Winner 2nd
Theme: Water
Edition: 1/1
Dimensions: 6681 × 4456

Licence: As long as the creator is credited, the primary NFT holder can use the NFT in advertising, to display privately and in groups, and to create virtual galleries, documentaries, and essays.
